actions.name: Anticipation

cost.trigger: At battle start or when user is switched in.

actions.description:
Trigger: At battle start or when user is switched in.
Effect: The user knows the highest Power attack on the target's Active List. The user takes half damage from this attack for the duration of the combat, until switched out, or Fainted.

system.description:
Trigger: At battle start or when user is switched in.
